name: Water Bottle Flip 2K17 - Impossible Tricky Shot
name_original: Water Bottle Flip 2K17 - Impossible Tricky Shot
description:
WBF 2K17 is here! The official water bottle flip sports game.

Test your bottle flipping skills by landing it perfectly on the target.
____________________________________________

• Simple one-tap gameplay
• 50 different levels
• Endless mode
____________________________________________

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
